name: libxmtp-js
author: jazzz <jazz@xmtp.com
description: Node.js package for the core XMTP utilities library

scripts.build: wasm-pack build -t web --out-dir ../bindings_js/src/pkg ../bindings_wasm && rm -rf dist/ && rollup -c
scripts.build:debug: wasm-pack build --debug -t web --out-dir ../bindings_js/src/pkg ../bindings_wasm && rm -rf dist/ && rollup -c
scripts.build:minify: npm run build && npx terser@latest --compress --mangle --output dist/cjs/index.cjs -- dist/cjs/index.cjs
scripts.format: npx prettier@latest --write src/ tests/ package.json rollup.config.js tsconfig.json vite.config.ts cli.js
